about_the_game:
RETOOLED is a fast-paced single player FPS where you will have to use all of your weapons and abilities to come out victorious.

Bunnyhop your way through increasingly complex arenas while facing a diverse and dynamic enemy lineup, designed to react to your actions and put your skills to the test.



TOOLS OF DESTRUCTION
Pick your gear and unleash havoc! Complete challenges to expand your equipment and arsenal.

Weapons - 6 weapons, each one has an alt fire option. To master RETOOLED you will need to learn the different weapon combos to unlock your true potential.

Equipment - In need of a Jump Pack? Double Jump Boots? NO?! Well then select something that alters your base stats. There are 5 different pieces of equipment.

Abilities - With your support, utility and offensive ability, you will be able to make your clutch moves when the situation calls for it! Find your preference out of 13 different abilities.

Fast movement - Master your movement, dash, bash, or boost jump your way out of dangerous situtations. Bunnyhop your way through the levels or even rocket jump if in need.



TALES OF DESTRUCTION
Wreck your enemies in style to earn high scores and climb the ranks. Will you achieve the rank title LORD OF TOOLS?

High score - Wreck in style, learn and earn the high score multiplier events. Will you manage to combine Air Time and the Bunny Trick with a Weapon Combo?

Ranks - Rise in your rank as a NOVICE to the LORD OF TOOLS.

Tales - Managed to complete the Story? Then the first addition to Tales, the Distribution Hub awaits you! You can expect more Tales to come in future updates.



RETOOLED is meant to be challenging and will give you, when or if conquered, a sense of accomplishment.

RETOOLED is constantly evolving and more is coming, want to follow along?
The development is streamed over on Twitch and teasers are posted on our .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: RETOOLED is a fast-paced FPS where you will have to use all of your weapons and abilities to come out victorious. Fight a vast array of enemy classes in complex arenas. Will you resist, rebel and reclaim? or perish... Bunnyhop your way into the action and find out while wrecking some robots!
